scheme_name: Nirmaan Sthal Par Karya Ke Dauran A-panjeekrat Shramik Ke Mratyu Ki Dasha Me Antyeshti Evan Anugrah Rashi Bhugatan Yojana
brief_description: This scheme aims to provide financial assistance to the families of unregistered workers who die during construction work in Madhya Pradesh.
detailed_description: The scheme falls under the purview of the Labour Department of Madhya Pradesh. The scheme provides financial assistance in the form of funeral and ex-gratia payments to the legal heirs of unregistered construction workers who die during construction site work under the MP Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board. The deceased worker does not need to be registered with the Madhya Pradesh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
benefits: Funeral assistance of ₹ 3,000/- In case of accidental death ₹ 4,00,000/- In case of permanent disability ₹ 2,00,000/-
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a domicile in the state of Madhya Pradesh. Applicant should be a Building and other construction workers. Applicant age should be between 18 to 60 years.

steps: The applicant has to submit the application form in the prescribed format and within the time limit to the office of the designated officer. Rural area - Chief Executive Officer, District Panchayat Urban area - Commissioner, Municipal Corporation / Chief Municipal Officer, Municipality / Municipal Council Apply duration Within 06 months from the death of the construction worker

documents_required: Prescribed application form. Death certificate. Copy of post-mortem report and FIR copy. Disability certificate given by the District Board in case of permanent disability.
